summary: This mod makes several alterations to perks in the Conjuration perk tree. Makes conjuration more powerful, yet makes it necessary to sacrifice a lot of perks for that power.
descriptionHtml:
As it is now, this plugin makes alterations to the summoner, atromancy, necromancy and twin souls perks. Details will follow below. It is my plan to expand upon this mod a bit more. More releases will be made in the following weeks. Keep in mind that a holiday is upcoming, so it might be a bit. :)

------------------------------------------------
Changelog:
Beta Version 0.7 
-Created Ranked Twin Souls Perk
-Recreated plugin using SkyEdit to ensure stability.

Beta Version 0.1 
-Initial Version

What this plugin changes:
------------------------------------------------

Changes to the Summoner Perk:
The perk now has 3 ranks.
Rank 1: Summon Atronachs/Undead/Daedra 2x as far, requires skill of 30 in Conjuration.
Rank 2: Summon Atronachs/Undead/Daedra 3x as far, requires skill of 70 in Conjuration.
Rank 3: Summon Atronachs/Undead/Daedra 4x as far, requires skill of 100 in Conjuration.

This is a significant increase in distance over vanilla Skyrim.

Changes to the Atromancy Perk: 
The perk now has 2 ranks:
Rank 1: 2x base duration of summoned Atronach, requires skill of 40 in Conjuration.
Rank 2: 5x base duration of summoned Atronach, requires skill of 75 in Conjuration.

Changes to the Necromancy Perk: 
The perk now has 2 ranks:
Rank 1: 2x base duration of raised undead, requires skill of 40 in Conjuration.
Rank 2: 5x base duration of raised undead, requires skill of 75 in Conjuration.

This will give you a 5 minute Flame Atronach or Bandit Zombie. Something I enjoy, and something that can tide you over until you get your master level thrall spells.

Changes to Twin Souls Perk:
This perk now has 4 ranks:
Rank 1: Summon 2 atronachs or undead.
Rank 2: Summon 3 atronachs or undead.
Rank 3: Summon 4 atronachs or undead.
Rank 4: Summon 5 atronachs or undead.
(Thanks to phenderix for guidance on how to do this. :D)
------------------------------------------------

Installation:
------------------------------------------------
Just copy the \"Conjuration Perks Overhaul Beta 0.1.esp\" to your data folder. 
------------------------------------------------
Uninstallation:
------------------------------------------------
Then delete the \"Conjuration Perks Overhaul Beta 0.1.esp\" from your data folder. <.<
------------------------------------------------
Conflicts:
------------------------------------------------
This mod would clearly conflict with anything that alters the same perks.
------------------------------------------------
Errors:
Please report any error, inaccuracies or other problems to the comment thread at the download link on skyrimnexus.com I\'ll be glad to address any issues that may arise as soon as possible. Being such a simple plugin, I don\'t expect any 

problems, but, as always, it\'s use at your own risk. (Lawyer talk stuff. :P)

Future Plans:
------------------------------------------------
-Multiple Ranks on Elemental Potency. (Probably 3 ranks, 20%, 30%, and 50% stronger each perk.)
-Multiple Ranks on Dark Souls (Probably 3 ranks. 1 adds 50 HP, 2 adds 50 HP, 3 adds 100 HP)

Re-release/ usage status:
------------------------------------------------
Don\'t republish elsewhere. That\'d be bad. If you didn\'t get this from www.skyrimnexus.com then I didn\'t put it there. 
Don\'t support sites that steal! :) As for using this in future mods, just give credit to all previous authors (that is 
me :P) as not doing so would be a dick move. :)
------------------------------------------------

You can download the mod from skyrim nexus.
author: SteepledHat
